@graph.dataElementDescription: Defines if the trade or reporting has to be done in local currency
@graph.label: Local Currency Position flag

@graph.dataElementDescription: A date on which the principal amount of a note, draft, acceptance bond or other debt instrument becomes due and is repaid to the investor and interest payments stop.
@graph.label: Maturity Date

@graph.dataElementDescription: Exchange rate is the price of one currency in terms of another currency. Exchange rates can be either fixed or floating. Fixed exchange rates are decided by central banks of a country whereas floating exchange rates are decided by the mechanism of market demand and supply.
@graph.label: Currency Group

@graph.dataElementDescription: Debt seniority refers to the order of repayment in the event of a sale or bankruptcy of the issuer.
@graph.label: Debt Seniority

@graph.dataElementDescription: A classification of a product based upon their characteristics and the market needs they address.
@graph.label: Product Type

dataElementDescription: Positive or negative shocks applied on the calculated PnL vectors or values, i.e. derived from a defined shift (e.g. +10%) to the corresponding USD-pair (e.g. USDAED) FX Spot rate
Positive or negative shocks applied on the calculated PnL vectors or values, i.e derived from a defined shift (e.g +10%) to the corresponding USD-pair (e.g USDAED) FX Spot rate
@graph.label: PnL Ladders

@graph.dataElementDescription: An instance identifier for a reference scheme group.
@graph.label: site code

@graph.dataElementDescription: A traded risk amount that represents the impact on the present value of a position of a one basis point (1bp) rise in the credit spread.
@graph.label: Credit Spread Basis Point Amount

@graph.dataElementDescription: Flag to check whether it is a limit monitoring position or not. (Inscope for Issuer default & credit spread Risk  Management framework)
@graph.label: Limit Monitoring Position Flag

@graph.dataElementDescription: The domestic risk-free interest rate at time T
@graph.label: Risk Free Rate (Domestic)

@graph.dataElementDescription: DePeg RNIV shows the total risk for De peg currencies that is not calculated via VaR
@graph.label: FX De-Peg Risk Measure

@graph.dataElementDescription: Book level attribute which determines whether the exposures in that book need to be sent to Raven AA for the CVaR calculations
@graph.label: CVaR Book

@graph.dataElementDescription: Derived rating [associated with the underlying instrument] based on Credit Spread per basis amount used to align the IRC Rating
@graph.label: Credit Spread Basis Point Amount Limit Rating

@graph.dataElementDescription: Zero-coupon rates for 1W,1M,2M,3M,4M,5M,6M,9M,1Y,2Y,3Y,4Y,5Y,7Y,10Y tenors
@graph.label: Zero-coupoun Rate

@graph.dataElementDescription: Debt seniority refers to the order of repayment in the event of a sale or bankruptcy of the issuer. Derived seniority [associated with the underlying instrument] used to map CS01 exposure to baseline and time series for IRC P&L calculation. If RefDebtSnrty is in ('Covered', 'Senior Secured', 'Senior Unsecured', 'Subordinated') then CVaRDebtSnrty = RefDebtSnrty else CVaRDebtSnrty = 'Subordinated'
@graph.label: IRC Debt Seniority

dataElementDescription: Close of Business Date defines the date for which the risk numbers will be calculated for. Close of Business Date used for reporting of VaR/SVaR/Max SVaR
Close of Business defines the date for which the risk VAR will be calculated and submitted  to regulator
@graph.label: Close of Business Date

@graph.dataElementDescription: Default and rating transition risks at 99.9% c.l., 1 year horizon.
@graph.label: IRC

@graph.dataElementDescription: A classification identifier that uniquely identifies a book.
@graph.label: Book Identifier

@graph.dataElementDescription: The rate specified in a currency forward transaction that locks in a foreign exchange rate between two currencies now, which will be exchanged on an agreed future date.
@graph.label: FX Forward Rate

@graph.dataElementDescription: Positive or negative shocks applied on the calculated PnL vectors or values, i.e. derived from a defined shift (e.g. +10%) to the corresponding USD-pair (e.g. USDAED) FX Spot rate
@graph.label: PnL Ladders

@graph.dataElementDescription: Derived product type used to determine whether a particular trade/position in spear needs to be part of the CVaR calculation
@graph.label: CVAR Product Type

@graph.dataElementDescription: Scope defines the relevancy in the IRC Calculation
@graph.label: IRC Scope

@graph.dataElementDescription: A region of the world where HSBC operates, as outlined by Group Strategy and Planning.
@graph.label: Region

dataElementDescription: Incremental value at risk, or iVaR, is a measure of risk attribution. It tells us how much risk a position or sub-portfolio is adding to a portfolio.
Default and rating transition risks at 99.9% c.l., 1 year horizon.
@graph.label: IRC

@graph.dataElementDescription: Derived country [associated with the issuer] used to map CS01 exposure to baseline and time series for CVaR P&L calculation used in VaR/SVaR/Max SVaR
@graph.label: CVAR Country

@graph.dataElementDescription: A threshold amount that represents the minimum capital amount required for market risk positions
@graph.label: Market Risk RWAs

@graph.dataElementDescription: The domestic risk-free interest rate at time T
@graph.label: Risk Free Rate(domestic)

@graph.dataElementDescription: Required for default calculation in the IRC model.
@graph.label: IRC Recovery Rate

@graph.dataElementDescription: The foreign risk-free interest rate at time T
@graph.label: Risk Free Rate (Foreign)

@graph.dataElementDescription: The smallest discreet unit of an organization of a banking entity that purchases or sells Financial Instruments for the trading account of the banking entity.
@graph.label: Desk name

@graph.dataElementDescription: The currency used for aggregation.
@graph.label: Aggregation Currency

@graph.dataElementDescription: Derived seniority [associated with the underlying instrument] used to map CS01 exposure to baseline and time series for CVaR P&L calculation used in VaR/SVaR/Max SVaR
@graph.label: CVAR Debt Seniority

@graph.dataElementDescription: A contractual amount on a financial instrument position or trade which is the nominal or face amount used to calculate payments made (and hence associated exposure) on that instrument.
@graph.label: Notional Amount

@graph.dataElementDescription: An application instance which provides the Trade data.
@graph.label: Source System

@graph.dataElementDescription: DePeg RNIV shows the total risk for De peg currencies that is not calculated via VaR
@graph.label: FX De-Peg Risk Measure

@graph.dataElementDescription: Derived rating [associated with the underlying instrument] used to map CS01 exposure to baseline and time series for CVaR P&L calculation used in VaR/SVaR/Max SVaR
@graph.label: CVAR Rating

@graph.dataElementDescription: The values of strike, maturity, and implied volatilities for USD/EUR-pair (e.g. USD|AED)
@graph.label: FX Option Smile

@graph.dataElementDescription: The rate specified in a currency forward transaction that locks in a foreign exchange rate between two currencies now, which will be exchanged on the spot.
@graph.label: FX Spot Rate

@graph.dataElementDescription: Spot rate for USD/EUR-pair (e.g. USDAED)
@graph.label: Spot Rate

@graph.dataElementDescription: The smallest discreet unit of an organization of a banking entity that purchases or sells Financial Instruments for the trading account of the banking entity.
@graph.label: Volcker Trading Desk

@graph.dataElementDescription: A party that is capable of entering into legally binding agreements
@graph.label: Legal Hierarchy

@graph.dataElementDescription: The values of maturity, and ATM implied volatilities for USD/EUR-pair (e.g. USD|AED)
@graph.label: FX Option Smile ATM

@graph.dataElementDescription: The foreign risk-free interest rate at time T
@graph.label: Risk Free Rate(foreign)

@graph.dataElementDescription: A credit risk rating is a quantified assessment of the creditworthiness of a borrower in general terms or with respect to a particular debt or financial obligation
@graph.label: Credit risk rating - standard CRR

@graph.dataElementDescription: An identifier that uniquely distinguishes a trade.
@graph.label: Trade Identifier

@graph.dataElementDescription: Obligor attribute which describes the entity debt, the coupon type and the calculation type. Determines "IN DEFAULT" positions which hold zero credit sensitivity
@graph.label: Calculation Description

@graph.dataElementDescription: Sector [associated with the underlying instrument] used to map CS01 exposure to baseline and time series for CVaR P&L calculation used in VaR/SVaR/Max SVaR
@graph.label: CVAR MarkIt Sector Code

@graph.dataElementDescription: A credit risk amount that represents the maximum loss which HSBC might suffer if an obligor defaults
@graph.label: exposure at default amount

@graph.dataElementDescription: Sector [associated with the underlying instrument] used to map Credit spread per basis point exposure to baseline and time series for CVaR P&L calculation used in VaR/SVaR/Max SVaR
@graph.label: IRC Sector

@graph.dataElementDescription: A legal entity whose changes in credit spread need to be simulated in the VaR/SVaR /Max SVaR calculations.
@graph.label: CVAR Obligor

@graph.dataElementDescription: A financial security identifier which uniquely identifies a financial security. (i.e. ISIN)
@graph.label: Financial security identifier

@graph.dataElementDescription: Product Sub type is defined as the different variants of the same  Product
@graph.label: Product Sub Type

@graph.dataElementDescription: Close of Business defines the date for which the risk VAR will be calculated and submitted  to regulator
@graph.label: Close of Business Date
